greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square array T(n,k), n >= 0, k >= 0, read by antidiagonals, where T(n,k) is the coefficient of x^(k*n) in expansion of ( (1 + x)/(1 - x) )^n.
formula: T(n,k) = (1/k) * Sum_{j=0..n} binomial(k*n,n-j) * binomial(k*n+j-1,j) for k > 0 and n > 0.
T(n,k) = Sum_{j=1..n} 2^j * binomial(n,j) * binomial(k*n-1,j-1) for n > 0.
mathematica: T[n_, 0] := 1; T[n_, k_] := Sum[Binomial[n, j] * Binomial[k*n + j - 1, n - 1], {j, 0, n}]; Table[T[k, n - k], {n, 0, 10}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Amiram Eldar_, Jul 24 2020 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Jul 24 2020
